title: How to Make Baked Pineapple Toast

steps.headline: Prepare the bottom layer.
steps.description: Mix the pineapple, melted butter, and sugar together in a medium sized bowl. Add this mixture to a 9 x 13 inch (23 x 33 cm) baking dish.

steps.headline: Layer the bread on top of the pineapple mixture.
Make the topping layer.
steps.description: In another medium bowl, mix the milk, eggs, and salt. Pour this evenly on top of the bread.

steps.headline: Allow the toast to cool.
steps.description: Serve this dish upside down, so the pineapples are on the top.

text: Preheat the oven to 325ºF/160ºC.  Prepare the bottom layer. Mix the pineapple, melted butter, and sugar together in a medium sized bowl. Add this mixture to a 9 x 13 inch (23 x 33 cm) baking dish. Layer the bread on top of the pineapple mixture.  Make the topping layer. In another medium bowl, mix the milk, eggs, and salt. Pour this evenly on top of the bread. Bake the bread for 25 minutes.  Allow the toast to cool. Serve this dish upside down, so the pineapples are on the top.
